languages.text: "Познавательно, Лорд-инквизитор". {n}Голос Хейнрикса может заморозить иного собеседника, но не Ксавьера.{/n}
"Illuminating, Lord Inquisitor." {n}Heinrix's tone would have frozen anyone else solid, but not Calcazar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Познавательно, Лорд-инквизитор". {n}Голос Хейнрикса может заморозить иного собеседника, но не Ксавьера.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Fascinating, Lord Inquisitor." {n}Heinrix replies with a secular bow.{/n}
"Fascinating, Lord Inquisitor." {n}Heinrix replies with a secular bow.{/n}
"Fascinating, Lord Inquisitor." {n}Heinrix's tone could freeze a person solid, but not Calcazar.{/n}
"Fascinating, Lord Inquisitor." {n}Heinrix's tone could freeze a person solid, but not Calcazar.{/n}
"Illuminating, Lord Inquisitor." {n}Heinrix's tone would have frozen anyone else solid, but not Calcazar.{/n}
"Illuminating, Lord Inquisitor." {n}Heinrix's tone would have frozen anyone else solid, but not Calcazar.{/n}

languages.text: « Il s'est avéré tout bonnement édifiant, seigneur inquisiteur, » {n}répond Heinrix sur un ton glacial qui figerait tout autre que Calcazar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Illuminating, Lord Inquisitor." {n}Heinrix's tone would have frozen anyone else solid, but not Calcazar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il a été fascinant, seigneur inquisiteur, » {n}répond Heinrix sur un ton glacial qui figerait tout autre que Calcazar.{/n}

languages.text: «Muy informativo, Lord Inquisidor». {n}El tono de Heinrix podría congelar a cualquiera... pero no a Calcazar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Illuminating, Lord Inquisitor." {n}Heinrix's tone would have frozen anyone else solid, but not Calcazar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Fascinante, Lord Inquisidor». {n}El tono de Heinrix podría congelar a cualquier persona... excepto a Calcazar.{/n}

languages.text: “言之有理，大审判官。”{n}海因里希的语气甚至可以把人冻在原地，但卡尔卡扎却丝毫不为所动。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Illuminating, Lord Inquisitor." {n}Heinrix's tone would have frozen anyone else solid, but not Calcazar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “非常有趣，审判长。”{n}海因里希的语气甚至可以把人冻在原地，但卡尔卡扎却丝毫不为所动。{/n}

languages.text: "Erhellend, Großinquisitor." {n}Heinrix' Ton hätte jeden anderen zu Eis eingefroren, nicht aber Calcazar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Illuminating, Lord Inquisitor." {n}Heinrix's tone would have frozen anyone else solid, but not Calcazar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Faszinierend, Großinquisitor." {n}Heinrix' Ton könnte jeden zu Eis einfrieren, nicht aber Calcazar.{/n}

languages.text: 「魅力的ですね、ロード・インクィジター」{n}ハインリックスの声音は人を凍りつかせるものだったが、カルカサルは違った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Illuminating, Lord Inquisitor." {n}Heinrix's tone would have frozen anyone else solid, but not Calcazar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「魅力的ですね、ロード・インクィジター」{n}ハインリックスの声音は人を凍りつかせるものだったが、カルカサルは違った。{/n}

languages.text: "Oldukça aydınlatıcıydı Lord Engizisyoncu." {n}Heinrix'in ses tonu, normalde herkesi taşa çevirirken Calcazar'a etki etmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Illuminating, Lord Inquisitor." {n}Heinrix's tone would have frozen anyone else solid, but not Calcazar.{/n}
